"Thermos Tales": A podcast series where people share their personal stories and experiences with thermos flasks.
"Thermos Trivia": A mobile app that tests users' knowledge of thermos flasks and their history.
"Thermos Time Travel": A virtual reality experience that takes users on a journey through time, allowing them to see how thermos flasks have evolved over the years.
"Thermos Hackathon": A hackathon-style event where developers and innovators can showcase their ideas for new and innovative uses for thermos flasks.

"Thermos Cookbook": A cookbook that features recipes that require a thermos flask to make, such as soups, stews, and hot drinks. This idea can help people appreciate the versatility of thermos flasks beyond just keeping things hot.
